title: NoSleep Podcast S16E14
description:
It’s Episode 14 of Season 16. Our correspondence makes it hard to believe what we see.
 
“Personal Log of Major Leon James” written by Kristina Orlea (Story starts around 00:08:15)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
Cast: Major Leon James – Graham Rowat, Computer – Nikolle Doolin, Lt. Colonel Arthur Deacon – Atticus Jackson
“I Looked Through Some Old Family Pictures, Something Doesn't Add Up” written by René Rehn (Story starts around 00:30:45)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
Cast: Narrator – Dan Zappulla, Michael – Atticus Jackson, Agent 1 – Peter Lewis, Agent 2 – Mike DelGaudio
“Reflecting on the Pond” written by Tom Hawkins (Story starts around 00:52:45)
Produced by: Jeff Clement
Cast: Narrator – Jeff Clement, Wife – Wafiyyah White, Aaron – Atticus Jackson
“The Moustache” written by Chris Allinotte (Story starts around 01:19:10)
Produced by: Phil Michalski
Cast: Kelly (narrator) – Atticus Jackson, Marnie – Sarah Thomas, Janice Gunnarson – Erin Lillis, Nurse – Mary Murphy, Carol – Nikolle Doolin, Doctor – Graham Rowat, Earl Walters – Mike DelGaudio
“Facsimile” written by Michael Miersen (Story starts around 01:53:40)
Produced by: Jesse Cornett
Cast: Narrator – Jesse Cornett, The Man – Atticus Jackson, Haddie – Sarah Thomas
 
 
This episode is sponsored by:
Betterhelp – Betterhelp’s mission is making professional counseling accessible, affordable, convenient – so anyone who struggles with life’s challenges can get help, anytime, anywhere. Get started today and get 10% off your first month by going to betterhelp.com/nosleep
Policygenius – Policygenius is America’s leading online insurance marketplace. Their mission is to help people get insurance right by making it easy for them to understand their options, compare quotes, and buy a policy, all in one place. Head to Policygenius.com to get started right now. Policygenius, when it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right.
 
 
Click here to learn more about The NoSleep Podcast team 
Click here for the Kindle version of S.H. Cooper’s “Inheriting Her Ghosts” 
Click here for other links to S.H. Cooper’s “Inheriting Her Ghosts” 
Click here to learn more about Kristina Orlea 
Click here to learn more about René Rehn 
Click here to learn more about Tom Hawkins 
Click here to learn more about Chris Allinotte 
Click here to learn more about Michael Miersen 
 
Executive Producer & Host: David Cummings
Musical score composed by: Brandon Boone
“Facsimile” illustration courtesy of Kelly Turnbull

content:encoded:
It’s Episode 14 of Season 16. Our correspondence makes it hard to believe what we see.

 

“Personal Log of Major Leon James” written by Kristina Orlea (Story starts around 00:08:15)

Produced by: Phil Michalski

Cast: Major Leon James – Graham Rowat, Computer – Nikolle Doolin, Lt. Colonel Arthur Deacon – Atticus Jackson

“I Looked Through Some Old Family Pictures, Something Doesn't Add Up” written by René Rehn (Story starts around 00:30:45)

Produced by: Phil Michalski

Cast: Narrator – Dan Zappulla, Michael – Atticus Jackson, Agent 1 – Peter Lewis, Agent 2 – Mike DelGaudio

“Reflecting on the Pond” written by Tom Hawkins (Story starts around 00:52:45)

Produced by: Jeff Clement

Cast: Narrator – Jeff Clement, Wife – Wafiyyah White, Aaron – Atticus Jackson

“The Moustache” written by Chris Allinotte (Story starts around 01:19:10)

Produced by: Phil Michalski

Cast: Kelly (narrator) – Atticus Jackson, Marnie – Sarah Thomas, Janice Gunnarson – Erin Lillis, Nurse – Mary Murphy, Carol – Nikolle Doolin, Doctor – Graham Rowat, Earl Walters – Mike DelGaudio

“Facsimile” written by Michael Miersen (Story starts around 01:53:40)

Produced by: Jesse Cornett

Cast: Narrator – Jesse Cornett, The Man – Atticus Jackson, Haddie – Sarah Thomas

 

 

This episode is sponsored by:

Betterhelp – Betterhelp’s mission is making professional counseling accessible, affordable, convenient – so anyone who struggles with life’s challenges can get help, anytime, anywhere. Get started today and get 10% off your first month by going to betterhelp.com/nosleep

Policygenius – Policygenius is America’s leading online insurance marketplace. Their mission is to help people get insurance right by making it easy for them to understand their options, compare quotes, and buy a policy, all in one place. Head to Policygenius.com to get started right now. Policygenius, when it comes to insurance, it’s nice to get it right.
